desc: A contemporary home drapery store and curtain makers in East London selling curtains, blinds, upholstery fabrics, cushions, rugs and textiles

layout.text: Our shop provides a range of home goods that cater to all areas of a considered home. Nestled in the heart of Hackney, we are able to draw on the wealth of designers and makers working around us, choosing to showcase products from local and independent creators.
